text: Basy () is a rural locality (a selo) and the administrative center of Basinsky Selsoviet, Limansky District, Astrakhan Oblast, Russia. The population was 997 as of 2010. There are 19 streets. == Demographics == === Ethnic composition === As of 2002, ethnic Russians and Chechens were the two largest groups in the village. {|class=standard style="width 70em; max-width 70%; " ! style="text-align:center" |Ethnicity !
